content: Creating a new topic just for this scheduled call.

First, I wanted to know if one of the FHIR-I chairs would be available on Friday Feb 05 from 11:00 EST - noon. Josh is available for the second half of the regular 2-hour timeframe, but if no other chair can make it - we will have to meet for the second half only.
Also, there will be no call this Friday due to the WGM

@Rick Geimer @Lloyd McKenzie @Yunwei Wang - would any one of you be available to chair a SMART web messaging meeting for an hour on Feb 05 from 11:00 - noon EST? I'm assuming Josh would take over when his previous meeting wraps up. If not, I'll just schedule the meeting from noon - 1:00 EST. Thanks!
No problem - I'm sending out the invite for the second hour only. Thanks!
@Carl Anderson @Josh Mandel Do you mind me moving SMART Web Messaging meeting notes to its own folder? So it is easier to find and organize SWM minutes.
Thanks to everyone who made it to the call today - apologies to anyone who missed the note that it was delayed an hour. Next week will be the usually-scheduled time.

Also, next week we will be addressing a block vote (with all issues labeled SWM-BV1 in Jira). There are 15 issues listed - each with a relatively minor change or question being addressed.

Issues:

  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29380 - postMessage incompatible between browser types
  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29344 - Add text to section 1.7
  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29346 - Q: how is a note added to a resource by an app
  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29383 - Missing yellow box in header?
  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29342 - Clarify 'gone wrong'
  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29382 - better contact information and publishing info
  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29339 - perhaps a scratchpad object shouldn't be called a Resourceâ€¦
  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29359 - support PATCH operations for scratchpad messages
  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29381 - is it safe to assume that the EHR can act on app messages?
  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29352 - overlooked from previous meeting (regarding redirect URLs)
  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29379 - clarify the distinction between SWM and FHIRCast?
  • addressed on a call with Carl:Josh:Matt earlier
    • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29370
    • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29371
  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29363 - does this only work in SPAs? Or also across separate windows?
  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-28469 - clarify that type ID is actually a string
  • https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-29362 - more info on Auth Server behavior re: tokens

One further item to come from Friday's meeting was the topic of how to best describe the scratchpad concept in the spec.

I've started a gdoc with a first take at potential new wording. If you're interested in helping me flesh out the description - here's a link to the doc so far.
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1krszxm4vMeLDsUyPrJXbzFfJiTaHKJiR3o9TOJlSbt0/edit#

For tomorrow's 2 hour call - I will be unavailable for the first hour, so I propose we meet for the second hour only. Sorry for the short notice - I only realized today that I was double booked with a medical appointment.

See you in the second half!

I didn't do a good job announcing the change of start time on this. Sorry @Bas van den Heuvel @ryan moehrke @Josh Bagley @Dr. Ivan S. Zapreev Brian Phinney and all the other regulars. Next week we'll be back as usual and will possibly be ready to wrap up the last of the ballot issues. :fingers_crossed:
